title: Bloomberg Markets: Doty on Rate Hike ETF
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Doty on Rate Hike ETF
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Bryce Doty\u0010Senior Portfolio Manager\u0010SIT Investments \u0010Discussing protecting bond portfolios with the RISE exchange traded fund as the Fed starts the process of rolling back their $4.4 trillion balance sheet.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
